main event: A civilian reported seeing a round, silver object, the size of a dime, stationary in the sky north of White Cloud, Michigan on July 3, 1958.
interesting points: The object was round and silver, and stationary during the observation,The witness described it as being the size of a dime at arm's length,There were four motor aircraft circling below the object shortly after it was spotted,The observation lasted approximately 30 seconds,The investigation concluded that the object was undoubtedly a balloon.
